title: UI/UX Design
desc: In my UI/UX process, I research client needs, strategize with wireframes, and create inspiring visuals. Prototyping ensures interactivity, and a design system maintains consistency. I collaborate closely with development teams for seamless integration and ongoing support.

title: Microinteractions & Motion Graphics
desc: I start by understanding client needs with moodboards, then independently create animations and interactions using After Effects. Continuous iteration ensures designs meet project requirements for a personalized touch and client satisfaction.

title: Icons and Illustration
desc: I create varied icons and illustrations, starting with hand-drawn drafts on paper and digitizing them with Illustrator for precision. For 3D illustrations, I use Blender, ensuring a versatile visual representation tailored to each project.

title: Branding
desc: To kickstart branding, I begin with a client questionnaire and research on competitors, users, and product/service types. After listing key points, I sketch diverse concepts on paper, digitize them, and present in a mockup-filled presentation. Upon finalization, I establish concise brand guidelines for impactful and cohesive branding.

title: Visual Design
desc: In addition to UI/UX, I offer support to the marketing team when needed, contributing to social media posts, advertisements, and client pitch presentations. Although opportunities to work on these aspects are rare, I can showcase previous experience in these areas, highlighting a diverse skill set and the ability to seamlessly integrate design elements into various marketing collateral.
